experiences.title: Software Engineer
description: Class is an Australian market leader in the SMSF finacial industry.

Class provides the financial services sector with innovative software solutions and is the developer of the first end-to-end online SMSF administration and reporting software, Class Super and Class Investment Reporter.
As a full-stack software engineer at Class, I am familiar with various cutting-edge technologies, and brought up to be an excellent developer and designer.

experiences.title: Full Stack .Net Programmer
description: As a full-stack developer, I was involved in the whole SDLC, from analyse to release. My major responsibilities include:
Confirmed project requirements by analysing program objective
Developed various applications base on requirements, including Web application, WPF, Web Services and VBA plugins.
Maintain databases and company daily operation system.

experiences.title: Master of Information Technology
experiences.company: University of New South Wales, Sydney
description: Achieved distinction average with a WAM of 83.25.
Won CSE Postgraduate Performance Award twice. (7th place in 2012 and 3rd place in 2013).
Was nominated to two specialisations: Database Systems and e-Commerce Systems

experiences.title: Bachelor of Automation Engineering
description: Achieved distinction average among all subjects
Made major contribution to a project about detecting planes from point cloud data in Computer Vision (One of the best designs of Zhejiang University in 2011)
